function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne pathogens from sick person, building, or intentional release","Impact":"Risk of infection for occupants","Mitigation":"Use of engineered techniques such as dilution, filtration, and UVGI","Technologies":"Dilution, Filtration, UVGI, HVAC systems","People":"Occupants, designers, engineers","Owner":"Designers, engineers, building owners"},{"Description":"Limitations of dilution method","Impact":"Inadequate removal of pathogens and risk of infection","Mitigation":"Address air distribution patterns and occupants' thermal comfort, consider hybrid ventilation","Technologies":"Hybrid ventilation systems","People":"Occupants, engineers","Owner":"Engineers, building owners"},{"Description":"Limitations of filtration method","Impact":"Inadequate removal of outside pathogens and risk of infection","Mitigation":"Consider using higher efficiency filters such as HEPA, enzyme filters; address penetration of HEPA filters by nosocomial infections","Technologies":"HEPA filters, Enzyme filters","People":"Occupants, designers, engineers","Owner":"Designers, engineers, building owners"}]}
